backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point, currently with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including mobile menu, dark mode toggle, hero video section, AI shade scanner, and product grid with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and functionality in the GlamAI Makeup application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for the design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tags and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing routing between Home and ShadeScanner pages, with mobile menu, cart drawer, theme provider, and navigation state.
frontend/src/components/AIShadeScanner.t: AI shade scanner component with image upload, simulated analysis with loading state, and personalized makeup shade recommendations display.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-in cart drawer from right side with item list, quantity controls, remove functionality, total calculation, and WhatsApp checkout button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, current year, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with hamburger menu button, logo, app title, theme toggle (moon/sun icon), and cart icon with item count badge.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component with video background, gradient overlay, and call-to-action buttons for shopping and AI scanner. Displays main tagline about AI-powered beauty and shade matching.
frontend/src/components/MobileMenu.tsx: Slide-out mobile navigation menu with overlay, displaying navigation items (Home, AI Shade Scanner) and logo. Handles menu open/close state and page navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component displaying product image, name, and price with a hover-activated 'Quick Add' button that adds items to cart and shows toast notification.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Grid layout displaying three featured products (foundation, lip gloss, eyeliner) with section heading and description. Maps over hardcoded product array to render ProductCard components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store for shopping cart state management with persistence. Handles adding, removing, updating quantities, clearing cart, and calculating total price.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides authentication status and identity to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for React Query hooks that interact with the backend. Contains commented example structure for future AI shade analysis mutation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors including primary, secondary, accent, and chart colors using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component combining HeroSection, features section with three benefit cards (AI-Powered, Premium Quality, Fast Delivery), and ProductGrid. Includes smooth scroll to products functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ShadeScanner.tsx: Page component for the AI Shade Scanner feature with header, instructions, and integration of the AIShadeScanner component. Displays a step-by-step guide explaining how users upload photos to receive AI-powered makeup shade recommendations.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Utility function that generates WhatsApp Web links with pre-formatted order messages containing cart items, quantities, prices, and total amount for checkout via WhatsApp number 918709162269.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, dark mode support, custom animations, border radius variables, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file documenting the makeup e-commerce website's architecture, features (mobile navigation, theme toggle, video hero, AI shade scanner, cart, WhatsApp checkout), and image requirements for product photos and branding.
